sec.div: Plant material and isolation of essential oil
sec.p: Leaves of M. officinalis ( n = 3) cultivated in France, Ireland, and Serbia were purchased from a local market in Jeonju, South Korea in May 2017. The samples were extracted using the steam distillation extraction technique. The water was removed on anhydrous magnesium sulfate, and the extracted oil was concentrated to dryness by rotary evaporation at 26 °C. The essential oil was kept at 4 °C to prevent volatile compounds.
